title.zh: Google 发布 Gemini 3.1 Pro，支持灵活推理模式
title.en: Google Rolls Out Gemini 3.1 Pro with Flexible Reasoning Modes

summary.zh: Google 发布了 Gemini 3.1 Pro，提供两种推理模式：「性能」模式用于处理复杂任务，「保真」模式用于日常请求。此次更新还引入了统一 API，简化了所有 Gemini 模型的开发集成。
summary.en: Google has released Gemini 3.1 Pro featuring two distinct reasoning modes: 'Performance' for complex tasks and 'Fidelity' for common requests. The update also introduces a unified API, streamlining development across all Gemini models.

title.zh: Anthropic 发布 Claude Sonnet 4.6，多项指标超越 Opus 4.5
title.en: Anthropic Releases Claude Sonnet 4.6, Surpassing Opus 4.5 on Most Benchmarks

summary.zh: Anthropic 发布了 Claude Sonnet 4.6，在大多数基准测试中优于 Opus 4.5，甚至在办公任务和财务分析等领域超过了 Opus 4.6。该模型现已成为免费用户的默认模型，免费套餐新增文件创建、连接器等功能。
summary.en: Anthropic has released Claude Sonnet 4.6, outperforming Opus 4.5 on most benchmarks and even surpassing Opus 4.6 in office tasks and financial analysis. It is now the default model for free Claude users, bringing file creation and connectors to the free tier.

title.zh: Qwen3-TTS 系列正式开源：支持语音设计、克隆与生成
title.en: Qwen3-TTS Family Open Sourced: Voice Design, Clone, and Generation

summary.zh: 阿里巴巴正式开源了 Qwen3-TTS 系列模型，支持语音设计、语音克隆和语音生成等多种功能。该系列模型在多个语音合成基准测试中表现优异，为开发者提供了强大的开源 TTS 解决方案。
summary.en: Alibaba has open-sourced the Qwen3-TTS family of models, supporting voice design, voice cloning, and voice generation. The models achieve strong results across multiple TTS benchmarks, providing developers with a powerful open-source speech synthesis solution.

title.zh: Google Lyria 3 音乐生成模型集成到 Gemini
title.en: Google's Lyria 3 Music Generation Model Integrated into Gemini

summary.zh: Google 将新的音乐生成模型 Lyria 3 集成到 Gemini 中，用户可以通过文本提示、图像甚至视频来生成带歌词的 30 秒音乐片段。这标志着多模态 AI 向音频创作领域的进一步扩展。
summary.en: Google has integrated its new music generation model Lyria 3 into Gemini, allowing users to create 30-second music clips with lyrics from text prompts, images, or videos. This marks further expansion of multimodal AI into audio creation.

title.zh: Apple 研究人员开发设备端 AI 代理，可跨应用执行复杂任务
title.en: Apple Researchers Develop On-Device AI Agent That Interacts with Apps

summary.zh: Apple 研究人员开发了一种设备端 AI 代理，能理解自然语言并代表用户与应用程序交互。该技术可催生新一代语音和文本助理，能够跨多个应用执行复杂任务，且数据不离开设备。
summary.en: Apple researchers have developed an on-device AI agent that understands natural language and interacts with apps on behalf of users. This could enable a new generation of assistants that perform complex cross-app tasks while keeping data on-device.

title.zh: FlashAttention-4 发布：在 NVIDIA Blackwell 架构上突破计算和内存瓶颈
title.en: FlashAttention-4: Overcoming Compute and Memory Bottlenecks on NVIDIA Blackwell

summary.zh: FlashAttention-4 针对 NVIDIA Blackwell 架构进行了深度优化，通过异步和低精度计算显著提升了注意力机制的效率。该工作解决了大模型训练和推理中的关键计算与内存瓶颈问题。
summary.en: FlashAttention-4 is deeply optimized for NVIDIA Blackwell architecture, significantly improving attention mechanism efficiency through asynchronous and low-precision computation. This work addresses critical compute and memory bottlenecks in large model training and inference.

title.zh: Render-of-Thought：将推理链可视化的新方法

summary.zh: 一项新研究提出了 Render-of-Thought 方法，通过将 LLM 的推理链进行可视化，帮助研究人员更好地理解和调试模型的推理过程。该方法为提升模型透明度和可解释性提供了新思路。
summary.en: A new research paper proposes Render-of-Thought, a method for visualizing LLM reasoning chains to help researchers better understand and debug model reasoning processes. This approach offers new insights for improving model transparency and interpretability.

title.zh: Anthropic 发布代理自主性实测数据：Top 0.1% 会话运行超 45 分钟
title.en: Measuring Agent Autonomy in Practice: Top 0.1% Sessions Run Over 45 Minutes

summary.zh: Anthropic 发布了关于 Claude Code 代理自主性的实测数据，显示排名前 0.1% 的会话运行时间已超过 45 分钟。这一数据表明 AI 编码代理正在向更长时间的自主工作能力演进。
summary.en: Anthropic has released real-world data on Claude Code agent autonomy, showing that the top 0.1% of sessions now run for over 45 minutes. This data indicates AI coding agents are evolving toward longer autonomous work sessions.

title.zh: Cursor 推出跨平台安全沙箱，为本地编码代理提供隔离环境
title.en: Cursor Launches Secure Cross-Platform Sandboxing for Local Coding Agents

summary.zh: Cursor 为本地编码代理推出了安全的跨平台沙箱功能，允许开发者在隔离环境中运行 AI 代理，并对文件系统和网络访问进行精细控制。该功能兼容 macOS、Windows 和 Linux。
summary.en: Cursor has introduced secure cross-platform sandboxing for local coding agents, allowing developers to run AI agents in isolated environments with granular control over file system and network access. Compatible with macOS, Windows, and Linux.

title.zh: Figma MCP 支持 Claude Code 生成设计稿并导入编辑
title.en: Claude Code to Figma: Generate Designs and Import for Editing via MCP

summary.zh: Figma 的 MCP（Model Context Protocol）现已支持使用 Claude Code 生成设计稿，并直接导入 Figma 进行进一步编辑。这打通了 AI 编码与设计工具之间的工作流。
summary.en: Figma's MCP (Model Context Protocol) now allows users to generate designs using Claude Code and import them directly into Figma for further editing. This bridges the workflow between AI coding and design tools.

title.zh: Anthropic 为 Claude Code 开发自动记忆系统
title.en: Anthropic Developing Auto Memory System for Claude Code

summary.zh: Anthropic 正在为 Claude Code 开发自动记忆系统，使 AI 代理能够在不同会话之间记住上下文和项目细节。这将显著提升编码代理的连续性和工作效率。
summary.en: Anthropic is developing an Auto Memory system for Claude Code that enables the AI agent to remember context and project details across sessions. This will significantly improve coding agent continuity and productivity.

title.zh: Import AI 445：为超级智能计时、AI 攻克前沿数学证明
title.en: Import AI 445: Timing Superintelligence; AIs Solve Frontier Math Proofs

summary.zh: Jack Clark 在最新一期 Import AI 中探讨了 2026 年可能成为超级智能决策关键年的观点，分析了 AI 在解决前沿数学证明方面的突破，并介绍了一个新的机器学习研究基准。
summary.en: Jack Clark's latest Import AI discusses the potential for 2026 to be a crucial year for superintelligence decisions, analyzes breakthroughs in AI solving frontier math proofs, and introduces a new ML research benchmark.

title.zh: MailCat：面向 AI 代理的开源电子邮件服务
title.en: MailCat: Open-Source Email Service for AI Agents

summary.zh: MailCat 是一款专为 AI 代理设计的开源电子邮件服务，提供简洁的 API 用于创建邮箱、阅读邮件和提取验证码。该项目使 AI 代理能够自主处理基于邮件的工作流程。
summary.en: MailCat is an open-source email service designed for AI agents, providing a simple API for creating mailboxes, reading emails, and extracting verification codes. It enables AI agents to autonomously handle email-based workflows.

title.zh: zclaw：在 ESP32 上运行的 888KB 超轻量 AI 助手
title.en: zclaw: Personal AI Assistant Under 888KB Running on ESP32

summary.zh: zclaw 是一个开源的超轻量个人 AI 助手，仅需不到 888KB 即可在 ESP32 微控制器上运行。该项目专为隐私和离线使用设计，展示了在资源极度受限的设备上部署 AI 的可能性。
summary.en: zclaw is an open-source, ultra-lightweight personal AI assistant that runs on an ESP32 microcontroller in under 888KB. Designed for privacy and offline use, it demonstrates the feasibility of deploying AI on extremely resource-constrained devices.

title.zh: 深度解析：Palantir 的秘密武器不是 AI，而是本体论
title.en: Palantir's Secret Weapon Isn't AI - It's Ontology: An Open-Source Deep Dive

summary.zh: 一篇深度分析文章指出，Palantir 的核心竞争力并非 AI 本身，而是其本体论（Ontology）系统——一种对复杂现实世界系统和关系进行建模的方法。文章以开源方式深入解析了这一架构的工作原理。
summary.en: A deep analysis argues that Palantir's key advantage is not AI itself, but its Ontology system - a method for modeling complex real-world systems and relationships. The article provides an open-source deep dive into how this architecture works.
